author: gsim
msg: * revised approach for setting tcp-nodelay on client to avoid breaking platform abstractions
* added ability to set tcp-nodelay on server side of the socket also

author: damitha
msg: Fixing memory leaks. Now client samples have zero memory leaks. Also server have 0 leaks for rm_echo_single_1_0.
But server has still few leaks for rm_ping_1_0 requests.

author: nslater
msg: added note to CHANGES about documentation change
